part.title: Bringing it all together
part.para: By following the steps described above, an organisation can produce a minimal set of data suitable for indexing by RES. This isn't the whole story, though: once you have a dataset, you still need to manage, host and develop it over time. These aspects of Linked Data are covered in detail elsewhere, so have been bypassed to keep this book as short and focused on RES as possible. However, if your organisation needs any assistance with these topics, please contact the RES team.
As a final example, here is the complete, valid RDF for the museum's resources, developed in the course of this book:
